explains: adj. 不正确的，错误的；不适当的；不合礼仪的
wordGroup: improper handling 处理不当；搬运不当；操作不当
improper integral 反常积分；[数]广义积分

sentences.en: It would be improper to comment at this stage.
sentences.cn: 在这个阶段发表评论并不恰当。

sentences.en: Its image has been sullied by $9 billion in improper accounting.
sentences.cn: 其形象被90亿的假账所毁。

sentences.en: The improper use of medicine could lead to severe adverse reactions.
sentences.cn: 用药不当会引起严重的不良反应。
